data.title: Part 1: The transmission, and reception management
data.desc: The role of Robus is to transmit and receive through the network messages to and from other nodes.

data.title: Part 2: The topology management
data.desc: Robus will rely on the unique ID distributed during the Luos_engine detection, Luos_engine will need topological information to provide a unique ID during detection.

data.title: Part 3: The protocol definition
data.desc: Robus simply add some information to guarantee the good transmission and reception of the message through physical support.

data.title: Part 4: The physical driver interface
data.desc: The Robus layer allows half-duplex wired communication between physical nodes and services.
